name: ReaderUp
tag_list: read, books, reading, gamification, education, mobile-app
description: The game that rewards you for reading!
overview:
ReaderUp™, the game that rewards children for reading!

ReaderUp™’s web-based mobile app platform connects children and their parents with books to foster bonding, encourage reading, and ignite passion for learning. ReaderUp is an early-stage company at the convergence of education and technology.
